alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Island; Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; City and Borough of Juneau; City and Borough of Yakutat; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Petersburg Borough (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued September 04 at 9:55PM AKDT until September 05 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...City and Borough of Yakutat, Glacier Bay, Eastern Chichagof Island, Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait, Admiralty Island, City and Borough of Juneau and Petersburg Borough. * WHEN...Until 10 AM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dense fog of one quarter mile or less is already occurring for Petersburg. There is a high probability that dense fog could occur in the additional areas mentioned above as sky conditions clear through the night and into early Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Admiralty Island; Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; City and Borough of Juneau; City and Borough of Yakutat; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Petersburg Borough
